languages.text: "Значит, Леди Теодора с самого начала планировала похитить десятину: подготовила уничтожение мира, чтобы замести следы, назначила слугу следить за миром, и даже предусмотрела развитие событий на случай своей смерти. Не хватало только удачного момента — такого, как сейчас. Простор терзают бедствия, и гибель мира будет выглядеть правдоподобно".

"So, Lady Theodora intended to steal the tithe from the start: she arranged the world's destruction to cover her tracks, installed a servant to keep an eye on things, and even made a contingency plan in case of her own death. All she needed was an opportune moment — like this one. With the Expanse being torn apart, the planet's death looks convincing."
languages.original_text: "Значит, Леди Теодора с самого начала планировала похитить десятину: подготовила уничтожение мира, чтобы замести следы, назначила слугу следить за миром, и даже предусмотрела развитие событий на случай своей смерти. Не хватало только удачного момента — такого, как сейчас. Простор терзают бедствия, и гибель мира будет выглядеть правдоподобно".

All she needed was an opportune moment — like this one. With the Expanse being torn apart, the planet's death looks convincing."

All she needed was an opportune moment — like this one. With the Expanse being torn apart, the planet's death looks convincing."

All she needed was an opportune moment — like this one. With the Expanse being torn apart, the planet's death looks convincing."

languages.text: «De modo que lady Theodora pretendía robar el diezmo desde el principio. Preparó la destrucción del mundo para encubrirse, colocó a un sirviente para que lo supervisara todo e incluso preparó un plan de contingencia en caso de fallecimiento. Solo necesitaba un momento oportuno... como este. Con la Extensión arrasada por el conflicto, la muerte del planeta es verosímil».
languages.original_text: "So, Lady Theodora intended to steal the tithe from the start: she arranged the world's destruction to cover her tracks, installed a servant to keep an eye on things, and even made a contingency plan in case of her own death. All she needed was an opportune moment — like this one. With the Expanse being torn apart, the planet's death looks convincing."

traits.locale_text: «De modo que lady Theodora pretendía robar el diezmo desde el principio. Preparó la destrucción del mundo para encubrirse, colocó a un sirviente para que lo supervisara todo e incluso preparó un plan de contingencia en caso de fallecimiento. Solo necesitaba un momento oportuno... como este. Con la Extensión arrasada por el conflicto, la muerte del planeta es verosímil».

languages.text: “也就是说，西奥多拉夫人从一开始就打算将帝国什一税据为己有。她制定了毁灭这个世界的计划，以此掩盖她的踪迹。她安置了仆人来监视这一切，甚至还制定了应急计划，确保即便她不幸身亡，计划也能顺利进行。她一直等待着合适的时机，就像现在这样——整个科罗努斯扩区四分五裂，即便这颗行星毁灭，也不会引起任何怀疑。”
languages.original_text: "So, Lady Theodora intended to steal the tithe from the start: she arranged the world's destruction to cover her tracks, installed a servant to keep an eye on things, and even made a contingency plan in case of her own death. All she needed was an opportune moment — like this one. With the Expanse being torn apart, the planet's death looks convincing."

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，西奥多拉夫人从一开始就打算将帝国什一税据为己有。她制定了毁灭这个世界的计划，以此掩盖她的踪迹。她安置了仆人来监视这一切，甚至还制定了应急计划，确保即便她不幸身亡，计划也能顺利进行。她一直等待着合适的时机，就像现在这样——整个科罗努斯扩区四分五裂，即便这颗行星毁灭，也不会引起任何怀疑。”

languages.text: 「つまり、レディ・シオドーラは最初から租税を盗むつもりだった。彼女は、自分の足跡を隠すために惑星の破壊を計画し、使用人をそのお目付役にして、彼女が死亡した場合の緊急時対応計画も作成した。彼女に必要だったのは、今のようなピッタリなタイミングだ。エキスパンスが引き裂かれて、惑星の死は明らかなようだ」
languages.original_text: "So, Lady Theodora intended to steal the tithe from the start: she arranged the world's destruction to cover her tracks, installed a servant to keep an eye on things, and even made a contingency plan in case of her own death. All she needed was an opportune moment — like this one. With the Expanse being torn apart, the planet's death looks convincing."

traits.locale_text: 「つまり、レディ・シオドーラは最初から租税を盗むつもりだった。彼女は、自分の足跡を隠すために惑星の破壊を計画し、使用人をそのお目付役にして、彼女が死亡した場合の緊急時対応計画も作成した。彼女に必要だったのは、今のようなピッタリなタイミングだ。エキスパンスが引き裂かれて、惑星の死は明らかなようだ」

languages.text: "Lady Theodora wollte den Zehnt also von Anfang an stehlen. Sie hat die Zerstörung der Welt eingefädelt, um ihre Spuren zu verwischen, einen Diener installiert, der alles im Auge behält und sogar für den Fall ihres eigenen Todes vorgesorgt. Alles, was sie brauchte, war ein geeigneter Moment ... wie dieser hier. Angesichts der Zerstörung der Ausdehnung wirkt der Tod des Planeten überzeugend."
languages.original_text: "So, Lady Theodora intended to steal the tithe from the start: she arranged the world's destruction to cover her tracks, installed a servant to keep an eye on things, and even made a contingency plan in case of her own death. All she needed was an opportune moment — like this one. With the Expanse being torn apart, the planet's death looks convincing."

traits.locale_text: "Lady Theodora wollte den Zehnt also von Anfang an stehlen. Sie hat die Zerstörung der Welt eingefädelt, um ihre Spuren zu verwischen, einen Diener installiert, der alles im Auge behält und sogar für den Fall ihres eigenen Todes vorgesorgt. Alles, was sie brauchte, war ein geeigneter Moment ... wie dieser hier. Angesichts der Zerstörung der Ausdehnung wirkt der Tod des Planeten überzeugend."

languages.text: « Or donc, dame Théodora comptait voler la dîme dès le départ : elle a prémédité la destruction de ce monde de façon à dissimuler ses traces, installé un serviteur pour veiller au grain et elle a même prévu un plan de secours au cas où elle mourrait. Il ne lui restait plus qu'à attendre un moment propice... comme celui-ci. Les Étendues étant déjà à feu et à sang, la mort de la planète ne risquait pas d'éveiller les soupçons. »
languages.original_text: "So, Lady Theodora intended to steal the tithe from the start: she arranged the world's destruction to cover her tracks, installed a servant to keep an eye on things, and even made a contingency plan in case of her own death. All she needed was an opportune moment — like this one. With the Expanse being torn apart, the planet's death looks convincing."

traits.locale_text: « Or donc, dame Théodora comptait voler la dîme dès le départ : elle a prémédité la destruction de ce monde de façon à dissimuler ses traces, installé un serviteur pour veiller au grain et elle a même prévu un plan de secours au cas où elle mourrait. Il ne lui restait plus qu'à attendre un moment propice... comme celui-ci. Les Étendues étant déjà à feu et à sang, la mort de la planète ne risquait pas d'éveiller les soupçons. »

languages.text: "Yani Leydi Theodora, başından beri aşarı çalmaya niyetliydi... Şüphe uyandırmamak için dünyanın yıkımını planladı, olan biteni kontrol etmesi için bir hizmetkâr görevlendirdi ve hatta ölümü durumunda uygulanacak bir acil durum planı bile yaptı. Tek yapacağı uygun anı bulmaktı, yani bu anı. Enginlik paramparça olmuşken gezegenin ölümü, hiç de şüphe uyandırmayacaktı."
languages.original_text: "So, Lady Theodora intended to steal the tithe from the start: she arranged the world's destruction to cover her tracks, installed a servant to keep an eye on things, and even made a contingency plan in case of her own death. All she needed was an opportune moment — like this one. With the Expanse being torn apart, the planet's death looks convincing."
